# Blacksmith Neighbors
Sat, May 31
| 
West Hills Vineyards
Join us for a fantastic evening with the Blacksmith Neighbors live in our tasting room! Their blend of folk, blues, and Americana will fill the air with soulful tunes as you enjoy our finest food and wine. It’s the perfect night for great music and great company—come experience it with us!
